pageProduct.name: Ostelin Kids Calcium & Vitamin D3 - Calcium & Vitamin D for Children - 90 Chewable Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Information

Ostelin Kids Calcium & Vitamin D3

Strong kids need strong bones

Ostelin Kids Calcium & Vitamin D3 are chewable supplements made from naturally occurring calcium and vitamin D3. These tablets contain no artificial colours and come in a pleasant berry flavour that kids enjoy.

Our Kids Calcium & Vitamin D3 tablets enhance the normal growth and development of healthy strong bones in children.

Each chewable tablet contains Calcium (as Carbonate) 350mg and Vitamin D3 300IU (Colecalciferol 7.5 micrograms).

Did you know?

Calcium aids in the achievement of peak bone mass, and children may require additional calcium to meet maximal bone growth.

Benefits of Ostelin Kids Calcium & Vitamin D3

Strong Bones

Calcium supports bone strength and bone density.

Strong Teeth

Calcium supports the development and maintenance of healthy, strong teeth.

Muscle Strength

Vitamin D3 is important for optimal strength and functioning of the skeletal muscle.

Immunity

Vitamin D3 is important for a healthy immune system.

General Information

Supports healthy bone & teeth

• Ostelin Kids Calcium & Vitamin D3 are chewable supplements that contain no artificial colours.
• Calcium supports bone strength and assists in the development of teeth.
• Vitamin D is a key nutrient which supports kid's general health & wellbeing as it; helps increase calcium absorption, maintains muscle strength and a healthy immune system function.
• In a berry flavour that kids enjoy.

Size: 90 Chewable Tablets

KEY FEATURES

• Chewable supplements that contain no artifical colours: With a berry flavour that kids enjoy
• Benefits of calcium: Supports bone strength and assists in the development of teeth
• Vitamin D is a key nutrient: It supports kids' general health and wellbeing
• Other benefits of vitamin D: Helps increase calcium absorption, maintains muscle strength, and maintains healthy immune system function
• This medicine may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase, in warnings section below. Follow the directions for use.

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use.

Ingredients

Calcium (from Calcium carbonate) 350mg
Colecalciferol 7.5 micrograms (300IU)

Contains: NO ADDED: Gluten, lactose, artificial colours or dairy products.

Contains sucralose and sulfites.

Halal certified.

Directions

Children 2 to 3 years: Chew 1 tablet daily.
Children 4 to 8 years: Chew 2 tablets daily.
Children 9 to 13 years: Chew 3 tablet daily.
Or as directed by your healthcare professional.

Not to be swallowed whole.

Not recommended for children under 2 years.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
